tool_description: Scrape emails, phone numbers and social profiles in real-time from all major social platforms: Facebook, TikTok, Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn and others from a website page in real-time.
name: Webpage Contacts And Social Profiles Scraper
title: Webpage Contacts And Social Profiles Scraper
tool_name: Webpage Contacts And Social Profiles Scraper

api_list.name: Scrape Contacts and Social links from Webpage
api_list.description: Extract emails, phone numbers and social profiles from website page url.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: Webpage URL from which to scrape phone numbers, emails and social profiles (e.g. https://www.wsgr.com/en/people/diya-jajal.html). Accepts any valid url.
